input: goal: How do I make peanut butter and jelly cookie [SEP] solution 1Make the dough with peanut butter, sugar, and an egg, place dough on wax paper push down in the middle with your toe and add some jelly. [SEP] solution 2Make the dough with peanut butter, sugar, and an egg, place dough on parchment paper push down in the middle with your thumb and add some jelly.

goal: What should I do if I have unused business attire that I want to donate? [SEP] solution 1Donate the items to the red cross or another similar charity, they use the items for people who are trying to get a job and are poor. [SEP] solution 2Donate the items to Dress for Success or another similar charity, they use the items for people who are trying to get a job and are poor.

goal: how do you use force touch on a keyboard? [SEP] solution 1click on the trackpad with one finger. [SEP] solution 2click on the trackpad with two fingers
goal: What ingredients do you need to make a coconut pie? [SEP] solution 1Coconut, flour, sugar, pepper and oil [SEP] solution 2Coconut, flour, sugar and oil
goal: how do you center a picture? [SEP] solution 1put it on the edge. [SEP] solution 2put it in the middle.

goal: How to dull a bedside light for reading at night? [SEP] solution 1Place a dark colored lampshade over the light so it produces a darkened color [SEP] solution 2Place a light colored lampshade over the light so it produces a darkened color
goal: To sweeten chili, you can [SEP] solution 1Add some brown sugar [SEP] solution 2Add some tabasco sauce
